content: Field of Fire is the third main area of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. Below, you'll find a detailed walkthrough of all the possible bosses there are to defeat in this section, along with conclusions to side quests, and key items to collect.

The content is as follows:
Field of Fire is the third main area of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. Below, you'll find a detailed walkthrough of all the possible bosses there are to defeat in this section, along with conclusions to side quests, and key items to collect.
